p:
Superoxide dismutase (SOD, EC 1.15.1.1) activity was analysed by inhibition of xanthine/xanthine oxidase generated O 2 − reduction of nitrobluetetrazolium (NBT)
20 . O 2 − reduced the NBT to blue formazan which shows a strong absorbance at 560 nm. One unit was defined as the amount of protein which generated the 50% percent inhibition of reaction. 1 ml of reaction mixture included 1 M Tris-HCl, 5 mM EDTA buffer (pH 8.0), 150 µM NBT, 400 mM Na 2CO 3, 1 g L −1 bovine serum albumine, 3 mM L −1Xanthine, 0.833 U mL −1Xanthine oxidase, 0.8 mM CuCl 2 and tissue homogenate (30 µL).
